description: After http://anidb.net/ch55763 [Dr Hell]`s defeat, life on Earth is threatened by the Emperor of Darkness and his seven generals who control the monsters of the Mycenaean Empire. These Warrior Beasts survived underground thanks to a union of their organic systems with mechanical bodies. To prevent the conquest wishes of these monsters there is the Great Mazinger, the powerful robot constructed by Dr. http://anidb.net/ch32239 [Kabuto Kenzou], son of the inventor of the Super Alloy Z and creator of Mazinger Z, Dr. http://anidb.net/ch5584 [Kabuto Juuzou]. The Great Mazinger is piloted by http://anidb.net/ch32237 [Tsurugi Tetsuya], an orphan raised by the same Dr. Kabuto, and trained since birth to fight aboard of the robot. The war against the Emperor of Darkness is very hard and it seems to be never ending.
